meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a long reading for such a short word! Think of something being <vocabulary>wicked</vocabulary>. <vocabulary>Evil</vocabulary>, even! But what is wicked? It's the side of the island... but only the side. It's the <reading>横島</reading> (よこしま).
